the user is a redemption provider, false otherwise."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate that the this implementation remains valid after an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"refreshMintReward(address)":{"details":"Updates the mining data for the user's lzybra mining incentives."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setBorrowApy(address,uint256)":{"params":{"newApy":"The new borrowing APY to set, limited to a maximum of 2%.","pool":"The address of the pool to set the borrowing APY for."}},"setFlashloanFee(uint256)":{"params":{"fee":"The fee percentage for lzybra, multiplied by 100 (for example, 10% is 1000)"}},"setKeeperRatio(address,uint256)":{"params":{"newRatio":"The new reward ratio to set, limited to a maximum of 5%.","pool":"The address of the pool to set the reward ratio for."}},"setMaxStableRatio(uint256)":{"params":{"_ratio":"The ratio in basis points (1/10_000). The maximum value is 10_000."}},"setMintVaultMaxSupply(address,uint256)":{"details":"This function can only be called by the DAO.","params":{"maxSupply":"The maximum amount of lzybra that can be minted for the asset pool.","pool":"The address of the asset pool."}},"setPremiumTradingEnabled(bool)":{"details":"This function can only be called by accounts with TIMELOCK or higher privilege.","params":{"isActive":"Boolean value indicating whether premium trading is enabled or disabled."}},"setProtocolRewardsPool(address)":{"details":"This function can only be called by accounts with TIMELOCK or higher privilege.","params":{"addr":"The new address of the protocol rewards pool."}},"setRedemptionFee(uint256)":{"params":{"newFee":"The new fee to be set."}},"setTokenMiner(address[],bool[])":{"params":{"_bools":"An array of booleans indicating whether mining is allowed for each contract.","_contracts":"An array of addresses representing the contracts."}},"setVaultBurnPaused(address,bool)":{"details":"This function can only be called by accounts with TIMELOCK or higher privilege.","params":{"isActive":"Boolean value indicating whether repayment is active or paused.","pool":"The address of the pool."}},"setVaultMintPaused(address,bool)":{"details":"This function can only be called by accounts with ADMIN or DAO.","params":{"isActive":"Boolean value indicating whether minting is active or paused.","pool":"The address of the pool."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"upgradeTo(address)":{"details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"FlashloanFeeUpdated(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the fees for flash loaning a token have been updated"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"becomeRedemptionProvider(bool)":{"notice":"User chooses to become a Redemption Provider"},"distributeRewards()":{"notice":"Distributes rewards to the ZybraProtocolRewardsPool based on the available balance of lzybra and eUSD.  If the balance is greater than 1e21, the distribution process is triggered.  First, if the eUSD balance is greater than 1,000 and the premiumTradingEnabled flag is set to true,  and the eUSD/USDC premium exceeds 0.5%, eUSD will be exchanged for USDC and added to the ZybraProtocolRewardsPool.  Otherwise, eUSD will be directly converted to lzybra, and the entire lzybra balance will be transferred to the ZybraProtocolRewardsPool."},"setBadCollateralRatio(address,uint256)":{"notice":"badCollateralRatio can be decided by DAO,starts at 130%"},"setBorrowApy(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Set the borrowing annual percentage yield (APY) for a asset pool."},"setFlashloanFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Update the flashloan fee percentage, only available to the manager of the contract"},"setKeeperRatio(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Set the reward ratio for the liquidator after liquidation."},"setMaxStableRatio(uint256)":{"notice":"dev Sets the maximum percentage share for lzybra."},"setMintVaultMaxSupply(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Controls the minting limit of lzybra for an asset pool."},"setPremiumTradingEnabled(bool)":{"notice":"Sets the status of premium trading."},"setProtocolRewardsPool(address)":{"notice":"Sets the address of the protocol rewards pool."},"setRedemptionFee(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the redemption fee.The fee cannot exceed 5%."},"setSafeCollateralRatio(address,uint256)":{"notice":"safeCollateralRatio can be decided by TIMELOCK. The lzybra vault requires a minimum safe collateral rate of 160%, On the other hand, the lzybra vault requires a safe collateral rate at least 10% higher than the liquidation collateral rate, providing an additional buffer to protect against liquidation risks."},"setTokenMiner(address[],bool[])":{"notice":"Sets the mining permission for the esLBR&LBR mining pool."},"setVaultBurnPaused(address,bool)":{"notice":"Enables or disables the repayment functionality for a asset pool."},"setVaultMintPaused(address,bool)":{"notice":"Enables or disables the mint functionality for a asset distributeRewards().details: The protocol rewards amount is notified to the ZybraProtocolRewardsPool for proper reward allocation.

getProtocolRewardsPool().details: Returns the address of the Zybra protocol rewards pool.

returns._0: The address of the Zybra protocol rewards pool.

getSafeCollateralRatio(address).details: Returns the safe collateral ratio for a asset pool.

params.pool: The address of the pool to check.

returns._0: The safe collateral ratio for the specified pool.

isRedemptionProvider(address).details: Checks if a user is a redemption provider.

params.user: The address of the user to check.

returns._0: True if the user is a redemption provider, false otherwise.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate that the this implementation remains valid after an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

refreshMintReward(address).details: Updates the mining data for the user's lzybra mining incentives.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newApy: The new borrowing APY to set, limited to a maximum of 2%.
params.pool: The address of the pool to set the borrowing APY for.

params.fee: The fee percentage for lzybra, multiplied by 100 (for example, 10% is 1000)

params.newRatio: The new reward ratio to set, limited to a maximum of 5%.
params.pool: The address of the pool to set the reward ratio for.

params._ratio: The ratio in basis points (1/10_000). The maximum value is 10_000.

setMintVaultMaxSupply(address,uint256).details: This function can only be called by the DAO.

params.maxSupply: The maximum amount of lzybra that can be minted for the asset pool.
params.pool: The address of the asset pool.

setPremiumTradingEnabled(bool).details: This function can only be called by accounts with TIMELOCK or higher privilege.

params.isActive: Boolean value indicating whether premium trading is enabled or disabled.

setProtocolRewardsPool(address).details: This function can only be called by accounts with TIMELOCK or higher privilege.

params.addr: The new address of the protocol rewards pool.

params.newFee: The new fee to be set.

params._bools: An array of booleans indicating whether mining is allowed for each contract.
params._contracts: An array of addresses representing the contracts.

setVaultBurnPaused(address,bool).details: This function can only be called by accounts with TIMELOCK or higher privilege.

params.isActive: Boolean value indicating whether repayment is active or paused.

setVaultMintPaused(address,bool).details: This function can only be called by accounts with ADMIN or DAO.

params.isActive: Boolean value indicating whether minting is active or paused.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

becomeRedemptionProvider(bool).notice: User chooses to become a Redemption Provider

distributeRewards().notice: Distributes rewards to the ZybraProtocolRewardsPool based on the available balance of lzybra and eUSD.  If the balance is greater than 1e21, the distribution process is triggered.  First, if the eUSD balance is greater than 1,000 and the premiumTradingEnabled flag is set to true,  and the eUSD/USDC premium exceeds 0.5%, eUSD will be exchanged for USDC and added to the ZybraProtocolRewardsPool.  Otherwise, eUSD will be directly converted to lzybra, and the entire lzybra balance will be transferred to the ZybraProtocolRewardsPool.

setBadCollateralRatio(address,uint256).notice: badCollateralRatio can be decided by DAO,starts at 130%

setBorrowApy(address,uint256).notice: Set the borrowing annual percentage yield (APY) for a asset pool.

setFlashloanFee(uint256).notice: Update the flashloan fee percentage, only available to the manager of the contract

setKeeperRatio(address,uint256).notice: Set the reward ratio for the liquidator after liquidation.

setMaxStableRatio(uint256).notice: dev Sets the maximum percentage share for lzybra.

setMintVaultMaxSupply(address,uint256).notice: Controls the minting limit of lzybra for an asset pool.

setPremiumTradingEnabled(bool).notice: Sets the status of premium trading.

setProtocolRewardsPool(address).notice: Sets the address of the protocol rewards pool.

setRedemptionFee(uint256).notice: Sets the redemption fee.The fee cannot exceed 5%.

setSafeCollateralRatio(address,uint256).notice: safeCollateralRatio can be decided by TIMELOCK. The lzybra vault requires a minimum safe collateral rate of 160%, On the other hand, the lzybra vault requires a safe collateral rate at least 10% higher than the liquidation collateral rate, providing an additional buffer to protect against liquidation risks.

setTokenMiner(address[],bool[]).notice: Sets the mining permission for the esLBR&LBR mining pool.

setVaultBurnPaused(address,bool).notice: Enables or disables the repayment functionality for a asset pool.

setVaultMintPaused(address,bool).notice: Enables or disables the mint functionality for a asset pool.
